author: emiglior
body:
#### PR description:

bugfix: this PR fixes the CMSSW issues https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/43097 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/45792 removing the DoubleSensGeomDet introduced for phase-2 Inner Tracker modules (T33 tracker geometry and following T35, T36, T37, T38 and T39) but actually not used in the code (and unlikely to be used in future).

No changes expected for the output.

#### PR validation:

Tested on:
-  issue #43097
   cmsRun Fireworks/Geometry/python/dumpRecoGeometry_cfg.py  tag=2026 version=D110
   (up to version D113)
- issue #45792 
   cmsRun Alignment/TrackerAlignment/test/Misalignments/createRandomlyMisalignedGeometry_Phase2_cfg.py
- D110: runTheMatrix.py --what upgrade -l 29607.0  
- D112: runTheMatrix.py --what upgrade -l 30407.0  

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Not a backport (there will be a companion backport for 14_1_X cycle)
title: bugfix: remove DoubleSensGeomDet (ph-2 InnerTracker)
